nodes.text: The Corellian Engineering Corporation's YZ-900 was a cargo vessel that appeared to be more of a paramilitary assault craft.

Measuring 54.5 meters in length, the YZ-900 was armed with a pair of heavy twin laser cannons, two double laser cannons, and a pair of concussion missile launchers that fired fore and aft. The YZ-900 required a crew of eight to operate, including gunners, and could carry up to fourteen passengers and 500 metric tons of cargo.
